Omar Technician Name Omar Title Technician Phone Jimmy Swiss Army Knife Name Jimmy Title Swiss Army Knife Phone About Jimmy Google reviewer Julie: "Wonderful experience here buying a golf cart. Very excellent service. Had our cart delivered 2 days after purchasing. We are loving it!!" Bill - Owner WilDar Wilby and Darby Mascots Name Wilby and Darby Title Mascots Phone About Wilby and Darby Wilby and Darby are our company mascots and are part of the Mom and Pop delivery team. Mike Retired Hall of Famer Name Mike Title Retired Hall of Famer Phone 772-595-9433 About Mike Google Reviewer RJ: "The entire team at Wildar is AWESOME! Bill, Darlene and Mike especially, did everything in their power to make my experience great. My situation and needs were more complex than most and they catered to every request and knocked it out of the park. Furthermore, I shopped and researched my purchase before deciding to go with Wildar. Their price on my cart and their financing rate was better than the competition. If you need a golf cart and/or trailer, these are the folks you need to speak with. 5 STARS ALL THE WAY!!!" CONTACT John Kelly R.I.P. July 1981-April 2023 Hall Of Fame Name John Kelly Title R.I.P. They are a family business and were very patient with my questions and concerns. Don‚Äôt have enough praise for Scott, Nick and especially John. Very happy with my total experience..." About WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers
We at WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers are your one-stop destination for all things golf carts and trailers in Fort Pierce, FL. Established in 2013 by Bill and Darlene Huston, our family-owned business is built on a foundation of exceptional customer service, extensive industry expertise, and a commitment to meeting the unique needs of our customers. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a state-of-the-art golf cart or a reliable trailer, WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers has you covered.
New & Used Golf Carts and Trailers for Sale
As a franchised dealer for leading golf cart brands like E-Z-GO¬Æ, Atlas¬Æ, Tomberlin¬Æ, and Evolution¬Æ, we offer a wide selection of new golf carts tailored to your needs and recreational lifestyle. For those seeking a budget-friendly option, we offer a complete lineup of high-quality refurbished golf vehicles. We can also help you build a custom golf cart to make your outings more fun and memorable.
On the trailer side, we carry an impressive inventory of enclosed cargo trailers, utility trailers, and dump trailers from top manufacturers like Extreme Cargo, Triple Crown, Hawke, and Master Tow. No matter what you need to haul, we can help you select the perfect solution for your requirements.
Financing
We understand that purchasing a golf cart or trailer is a significant investment. That‚Äôs why we offer flexible financing options designed to fit your budget. Our finance team works with reputable lenders to help you secure competitive rates and terms, ensuring you can take home your preferred equipment without breaking the bank.
Parts Department
Our fully stocked parts department ensures you have everything to keep your golf cart or trailer in peak condition. From OEM parts for your E-Z-GO¬Æ or Tomberlin¬Æ golf cart to trailer accessories and upgrades, we have it all. Our knowledgeable staff is here to help you find the perfect part or accessory for your specific needs.
Service Department
Our service experts at WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers are available to help keep your vehicle safe and functioning smoothly. We offer expert maintenance and repairs for both golf carts and trailers, including routine servicing and complex repairs. Our state-of-the-art facility and skilled technicians deliver outstanding results with every visit.
Rentals and Storage
Do you need a golf cart for a special event or a trailer for a one-time job? WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers offers convenient rental options to suit your short-term needs. We also provide secure storage solutions for your golf carts and trailers, giving you peace of mind that your equipment is protected when not in use.
Contact Us
When you‚Äôre ready to go shopping for golf carts or trailers, visit WilDar Golf Carts and Trailers in Fort Pierce, FL. We proudly serve West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, and St. Lucie, so reach out today. Dial (772) 595-9433 to speak with one of our team members or complete the online form below to get started!
Contact Us
Wildar Golf Carts & Trailers is conveniently located near the areas of Port St Lucie, Ft Pierce, Vero Beach, Jensen Beach, Stuart, Palm City, and Okeechobee.
